page.title: 17FARMING,LAND,STOCK,&CROPS.
page.content: Fiddleford. Most of the buildings are purpose built and very modern. There is also a Manor_House. {THE SHOOT}The shoot is organised once a year by the shoot managers and the part time keepers. This does not play much of a part on the farm as it is just for Mr. Pitt_Rivers and his friends'relaxation. Most of the birds are from the farm's own stock of chicks.The birds that are purposely bred for the shoot are pheasants, partridges & duck. {SMALLER FARMS }Besides Hinton St. Mary farm, there are several smaller farms to the west of the block. These are mainly dairy farms but a few own pigs and poultry. Few are larger than 100 acres.
